title: Skins
body: The LoL team skins are unavailable will they come back when the new SKT skins are released?

replies.body: While I can't comment as to any specifics of when the eSports skins will be available for purchase again, they typically come out of the legacy vault for major international tournaments such as MSI and Worlds. Given this, I imagine that they'll be available for purchase sometime around November, but again, I can't provide any specifics or definitive answers. Sorry!
